net.proteusframework.internet.servlet.filter

Class RequestResponseLogFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.internet.servlet.filter.RequestResponseLogFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Filter

    public class RequestResponseLogFilter
extends Object
implements Filter
    Filter to log request and responses. This is used only for debugging, never use this in a production environment.
    Author:
    Pat Double (double@i2rd.com)
